custom_fields.key_topics: Throughout this course, students will delve into the two largest comic industries which are Marvel Comics and DC Comics. Students will grasp and tackle the main ideas of the movies, animations, and T.V shows and discuss theories, character analysis, and class discussions.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: There will be reading, a mid-semester essay and final reflection.
custom_fields.goals: To understand both universes in depth.
custom_fields.relevance: Students will critically analyze and discuss the difference between the two comic worlds.

long_desc: Throughout this course, students will delve into the two largest comic industries which are Marvel Comics and DC Comics. Students will grasp and tackle the main ideas of the movies, animations, and T.V shows and discuss theories, character analysis, and class discussions.
name: Student Taught Course: The Big Leagues: Marvel VS DC
base_name: Student Taught Course: The Big Leagues: Marvel VS DC
